summary: Promotion: clerk canaries from dry_run to limited_live with strict caps and monitoring.

directives.details: Activate 3 canary clerks under limited_live lane only.
Caps: 3 ops/min, 6 ops/order, 60 ops/day; scope = War Office clerical tasks only.
Run 24h monitor; abort on policy violation, abnormal rate, or any dark sign.
Post 24h results with metrics, anomalies (if any), and recommendation to promote or rollback.
